snippet: Scott Dixon, followed by Charlie Kimball and Dario Franchitti, led a podium sweep for Chip Ganassi Racing in IndyCar’s first race at Pocono since 1989.
abstract: Scott Dixon wins IndyCar race at Pocono Raceway, followed by Charlie Kimball and Dario Franchitti, amounting to podium sweep for Chip Ganassi Racing team at first IndyCar race at venue since 1989; other auto racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Scott Dixon, followed by Charlie Kimball and Dario Franchitti, led a podium sweep for Chip Ganassi Racing in IndyCar’s first race at Pocono since 1989.

headline.main: Dixon Prevails at Pocono, Leading a Ganassi Sweep
headline.print_headline: Dixon Prevails at Pocono, Leading a Ganassi Sweep
